title: scale
description: The `scale` object in Pure Data is a GEM object used to manipulate the current transformation matrix for graphical objects. It accepts a `gemList` and applies scaling based on its arguments: a single float for uniform scaling, three floats for per-axis scaling (X, Y, Z), or four arguments for scaling by an amount along a specified vector. This object is fundamental for resizing and transforming visual elements within a GEM patch.
